DOC.brief_summary: This study will translate an English case definition of poststroke fatigue and validate it against the Multidimensional Fatigue Questionnaire-20 and the Fatigue Severity Scale
DOC.brief_title: How to Identify Fatigue in Stroke Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with a clinical stroke within the last 6 months as judged by a senior doctor or by the research assistant. Patients that have given written informed consent Patients with aphasia, dementia or cognitive deficits so severe that they are unable to understand the purpose of the interview and the questionnaire.
